Posts.Content: My husband had cancer of the oesophagus - had combined chemo/radiation treatment to shrink tumour before surgery. Our daughter purchased a supplement for him to take in conjunction with his treatment - with an ok from his oncologist - whether due to luck or the supplement he had few side-effects and amazed medicos by how well he coped - essential thing was it was supplementary/complementary medication not a replacement.
Posts.Title: Use of Alternative Medicine for Cancer and Its Impact on Survival
